value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|It's time to take another crack at my
ultimate summer plan,
$Nu!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Didn't you learn your lesson last time,
Commander Anna?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Nope! This time we're heading to a
tropical island in the World of
Conquest.$k$pAnd nobody will interfere with my
master plans there! Hehehe!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Don't you think the Anna from that
world will send you another
outrageous bill?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|That "other" Anna and I have already
come to an agreement. I am an
expert negotiator, after all.$k$pSo I stayed up all night working on
this new-and-improved tome!$k$pThis one doesn't just capture still
images... It captures moving pictures!
It's OK to be impressed.$k$pIt'll be perfect for catching everyone
having fun in the sun...in their
swimsuits! Hehehe!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Commander, I wish you would direct
all this effort toward something more
helpful to the Order.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|This IS for the Order, Alfonse! Now
let's move out, and repeat after me:
$EFace_Smile|For the Order!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|There's just one way to get to this
island: through the World of
Conquest. And that's not all...$k$pApparently this place is crawling with
Nohr's royalty right now.$k$p$WmMPID_水着カムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Swim17,Face|$w0|We won tickets to this island, but it
looks like this contract is interrupting
our vacation and forcing us to fight.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エリーゼ,ch05_25_Elise_F_Swim17,Face|$w0|Aw, boo! I was having fun playing
with you, Big Sis!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Nohrian princesses! Looks like my
intel was good. Now let's get those
moving pictures... Hehehe!$k$pSnap to it, everyone! Let's show
these Heroes our power and free
them from their contracts!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着カムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Swim17,Face|$w0|We had better retreat for now.
Let's go, Elise.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エリーゼ,ch05_25_Elise_F_Swim17,Face|$w0|You got it, Big Sis!$k$p$Sbs150|
